scripts.create-css: mkdir css && cd css && touch main.css && cd ../
scripts.create-js: mkdir js && cd js && touch main.js && cd ../
scripts.create-html:
create-html -t test "" -c https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/materialize/1.0.0/css/materialize.min.css -c ./css/main.css -b "

Hellow world

" -s https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.slim.min.js -s https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/materialize/1.0.0/js/materialize.min.js -s ./js/main.js -o index.html
scripts.create: npm run create-css && npm run create-js && npm run install-html && npm run create-html
